overview: To embody moments of transition between two different worlds, worlds which look alike. There are only antechambers and settings. Being the mask one wears, I have lost my decency. Dream and lie, what is the prospect of a one-eyed man? I question the dreamerâ€™s figure as being simultaneously the emitter and the receiver of its own visions, the director and unique spectator of its projections.
title: Au fond des yeux
